mapper.select: SELECT OQ.OQNA_NO, OM.ORDER_NO, P.PD_NAME, OQ.OQNA_TITLE, C.C_ID, C.C_NO, D.DR_NO, D.DR_ID, OQ.OQNA_CONTENT, OQ.OQNA_DATE, OQ.OQNA_STATUS, OQ.OQNA_ANSWER FROM ORDERQNA OQ LEFT JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OQ.ORDER_NO=OM.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(OM.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON(OP.PD_NO=P.PD_NO) LEFT JOIN CLIENT C ON(OM.C_NO=C.C_NO) LEFT JOIN DRCLIENT D ON(OM.DR_NO=D.DR_NO) ORDER BY OQ.OQNA_DATE DESC
